::Prowl/Scattershot::

Prowl nods at Dinobot's comments. He pauses in the hallway, still against the 
wall. Would the Alliance really put Iron Raptor and Tavatron in the brig? He 
frowns. After what he heard of the last attempt on his comm-link, the 
Alliance would get careless. But not that careless. Instead.....

Prowl's eyes widen, remembering the tour Zardus had given him of the base 
back in the days when the Maximals and the Alliance had fought side by side. 
He remembered how Zardus had shown him the torture chambers, boasting on the 
different devices.

Prowl hisses into his silencer. The Alliance would shurely teach the Maximals 
a lesson after an attempt was made to steal away the hostages, and one had 
been made.

"The torture chambers!" he exclaims into his comm-link, "Let's check there 
first."

Prowl looks back at Dinobot, his eyes widening as he sees a bot. "Watch out!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scattershot walks into the Alliance base, happily talking to DeathStorm's 
head.

"Yeah, I hate that too! But the best thing: icing!" Scattershot says happily 
to the head as he aproaches Dinobot and Prowl's position.
